about:
|| तत्त्वमसि || 
 
 I am a dedicated software engineer with a deep-seated passion for web development, database queries, backend configuration, and data administration. My journey in the world of technology has been driven by an unwavering commitment to learning and problem-solving. 
 My journey as a software engineer is an ever-evolving quest for excellence, and I am excited to see where the path of continuous learning and growth will take me next.
